title: Vox Machina Ep. 7 - The Throne Room
description: With an uneasy agreement struck between Kima and Clarota, Vox Machina quietly begin a search of Emberhold. Lady Kima means to strike a blow against their unseen enemy by cutting off the head of K’Varn’s military forces. The party battles their way through the fortress and come face to face with the Duergar King and Queen themselves...
